text: Lal Khan (born Tanveer Gondal; June 1956 - 21 February 2020) was a Pakistani political activist and Marxist political theorist. He was a physician by profession but ceased practicing medicine. He was the leader of the Pakistani Marxist organisation The Struggle, and editor of its newspaper. He also wrote regular articles for Daily Times and the Dunya. He died on 21 February 2020 of cancer at the age of 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Pakistani physicians Category:Political activists Category:Editors Category:Pakistani writers Category:Pakistani activists
title: Lal Khan
